00557                 static void threadUpdate()
00558                 {
00559                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00560                         {
00561                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._processQueuedSounds();
00562                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._updateBuffers();
00563                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(10));
00564                         }
00565                 }
